page.title: 07RECREATION IN NW NEWBURY
page.content: {RECREATIIONAL FACILITIES}overall are poor.Many people have to leave area to pursue choice of recreational activity.Provisions are particularly poor for younger age groups. {HOBBIES}listed include fishing,gardening,ballroom dancing.Reading and watching T.V. popular. {CLUBS}include Newbury Judo Club,a Tennis club and thriving{Shaw Social {Club.}2 Recreation Grounds in area,one with cricket pitch.One fairly recently laid out 17 hole {golf course}.{ {Women's Institute}draws members from locality.3 {Village/Church halls } available for hire. {PUBLIC HOUSES}popular,especially those providing bar meals.
